restaurant_options.name: Brett's Waterway Cafe
restaurant_options.description: Waterfront dining with marina views, fresh catch daily. ✅ NON-SEAFOOD: Steaks, chicken, burgers available
restaurant_options.tips: Amazing sunset views. Has steaks, chicken, and burgers for non-seafood eaters!

restaurant_options.name: Salty Pelican Bar & Grill
restaurant_options.description: Heart of downtown waterfront, blackened grouper tacos, fresh oysters, fried tuna. ✅ NON-SEAFOOD: Burgers, chicken sandwiches, steaks
restaurant_options.tips: Best place to catch sunset over the river. Full bar & grill menu with chicken, burgers, steaks!

restaurant_options.name: Down Under
restaurant_options.description: Under the bridge to Amelia Island, oysters, crab dip, shrimp, fresh fish with waterfront view. ✅ NON-SEAFOOD: Burgers, chicken wings, steaks
restaurant_options.tips: Casual vibe with burgers, wings, and chicken tenders for non-seafood eaters

restaurant_options.name: Sandbar
restaurant_options.description: Directly on Main Beach with Atlantic Ocean views, coastal cuisine, 1200+ whiskey selections. ✅ NON-SEAFOOD: Steaks, chicken, burgers, pasta
restaurant_options.tips: Unobstructed beach views, live music on weekends. Great steaks and chicken options!

restaurant_options.name: Beach Diner
restaurant_options.description: Family owned unique breakfast & lunch, Chocolate Chip Pancakes, Shrimp & Crab Omelette, Fish & Grits
restaurant_options.tips: Popular local spot, expect a wait on weekends

restaurant_options.name: Dune Bar
restaurant_options.description: Beach bar with tropical drinks, frozen cocktails, and light bites
restaurant_options.tips: Open 11am-6pm daily, perfect beach relaxation

restaurant_options.name: Lobby Bar
restaurant_options.description: Classic lounge with craft cocktails, wine, and small plates. MUST TRY: Smoked Old Fashioneds, charcuterie board, sushi
restaurant_options.tips: Open 3pm-12am Mon-Thu, 3pm-1am Fri-Sat. Boss recommendation: 'Wonderful charcuterie at the bar, most wonderful smoked Old Fashioneds, sushi in the lobby!'

restaurant_options.name: Salt Life Food Shack
restaurant_options.description: Oceanfront casual dining with amazing views and fresh seafood. ✅ NON-SEAFOOD: Burgers, chicken sandwiches, wings
restaurant_options.tips: Perfect for lunch, great outdoor seating. Has burgers and chicken for non-seafood eaters!

restaurant_options.name: Timoti's Seafood Shak
restaurant_options.description: SARAH'S RECOMMENDATION for lunch! Family-friendly wild-caught seafood, fresh fried shrimp, poke bowls, fish tacos, lobster rolls. ⚠️ LIMITED NON-SEAFOOD: Chicken tenders available
restaurant_options.tips: Sarah says: 'You must go to Timotees for lunch one day!' Mostly seafood but has chicken tenders

restaurant_options.name: David's Restaurant & Lounge
restaurant_options.description: 🎂 BIRTHDAY DINNER! Upscale American cuisine with cocktails in downtown historic district. Perfect for special celebrations!
restaurant_options.tips: Mention it's a 40th birthday! Request window table. Ask about chef's specials and save room for dessert. Business casual dress code (no shorts/flip-flops). Michael is treating for the birthday celebration!

restaurant_options.name: Le Clos
restaurant_options.description: Romantic French bistro with extensive wine selection and intimate atmosphere
restaurant_options.tips: Reservations required, business casual dress code. Perfect for special occasions with excellent wine list

restaurant_options.name: Burlingame
restaurant_options.description: Charming 1947 cottage with modern twist, seasonal menu with Seafood Gumbo, Blue Crab Cakes, Lamb Bolognese. ✅ NON-SEAFOOD: Lamb, chicken, steaks, pasta
restaurant_options.tips: Intimate setting, reserve ahead for special occasions. Great meat and pasta options! Highest rated restaurant in area

restaurant_options.name: The Boat House
restaurant_options.description: Waterfront seafood with fresh local catches and harbor views. ✅ NON-SEAFOOD: Steaks, chicken, pasta dishes
restaurant_options.tips: Has steaks, grilled chicken, and pasta for non-seafood diners

restaurant_options.name: Arte Pizza
restaurant_options.description: Authentic Neapolitan wood-fired pizzas, fresh high-quality ingredients, local favorite
restaurant_options.tips: Best pizza on the island, simple but perfect

restaurant_options.name: Sliders Seaside Grill
restaurant_options.description: Beachfront burgers, seafood, and casual American fare with ocean views
restaurant_options.tips: Perfect beach lunch spot, great burgers and fish sandwiches

restaurant_options.name: Burlingame
restaurant_options.description: Charming 1947 cottage with modern twist, seasonal menu with Seafood Gumbo, Blue Crab Cakes, Lamb Bolognese. ✅ NON-SEAFOOD: Lamb, chicken, steaks, pasta
restaurant_options.tips: Intimate setting, reserve ahead for special occasions. Great meat and pasta options!

restaurant_options.name: Espana Restaurant & Tapas
restaurant_options.description: SARAH'S RECOMMENDATION! Authentic Spanish tapas, paella, extensive wine selection, intimate European atmosphere
restaurant_options.tips: Perfect for wine and tapas - great small plates to share. Sarah says: 'Espana for wine and tapas!'

restaurant_options.name: Coquina
restaurant_options.description: Oceanfront restaurant with beach views and casual coastal fare. ✅ NON-SEAFOOD: Burgers, chicken sandwiches, salads
restaurant_options.tips: Open 11am-9pm daily, perfect for lunch with ocean breeze. Great burgers and chicken!

restaurant_options.name: Nana Teresa's Bake Shop
restaurant_options.description: Fresh baked goods, pastries, coffee, and breakfast items
restaurant_options.tips: Early morning opening, perfect for breakfast treats

restaurant_options.name: First Drop Coffee
restaurant_options.description: Ritz-Carlton coffee shop with espresso, specialty drinks, and light bites
restaurant_options.tips: Open 7am-7pm daily, convenient for hotel guests

restaurant_options.name: Mocama Coffee
restaurant_options.description: Premium espressos, drips, pour-overs with state-of-the-art equipment, under same roof as Mocama Beer Company
restaurant_options.tips: Coffee by day, beer by night at same location

restaurant_options.name: Tortuga Jacks
restaurant_options.description: Baja Mexican upstairs at Sliders, oceanfront sunrise breakfast, only non-resort beachfront breakfast
restaurant_options.tips: Sunrise breakfast to watch dawn over ocean

restaurant_options.name: Amelia Island Coffee
restaurant_options.description: Beloved coffee shop since 1995 in 140-year-old brick building, locally roasted coffee from Yulee, pastries, breakfast sandwiches
restaurant_options.tips: Historic downtown location at 207 Centre St, great atmosphere

restaurant_options.name: Aloha Bagel and Deli
restaurant_options.description: Bright cheerful bagel shop with delicious bagels, sandwiches, salads, sweets, party platters. Breakfast served all day
restaurant_options.tips: Open till 2pm, breakfast all day, very popular

activity_options.name: Sunset Beach Selfies
activity_options.description: Catch golden hour on the beach! Perfect lighting for photos and selfies. Capture the sunset, take fun shots, create memories
activity_options.tips: Sunset timing is perfect for amazing photos. Ocean backdrop + golden light = Instagram gold!

activity_options.name: Two Resort Pools
activity_options.description: Multiple pools including one with kids splash pad
activity_options.tips: Kids splash pad is perfect for little ones!

activity_options.name: Hot Tub Relaxation
activity_options.description: Unwind in resort hot tubs with ocean views
activity_options.tips: Perfect after activities or before dinner. Very relaxing!

activity_options.name: Nightly Pirate Toast
activity_options.description: Fun pirate-themed toast ceremony in lobby
activity_options.tips: Kids love this! Check lobby for nightly time

activity_options.name: Casual Beach Day & Seashell Hunting
activity_options.description: Relaxed beach time with umbrella and chairs. Walk the shoreline collecting seashells, sand dollars, and unique finds. Perfect for low-key beach enjoyment!
activity_options.tips: Best shelling at low tide! November is great season for shells. Bring a bag for your finds. No premium seating needed - just pure beach relaxation

activity_options.name: Beach Selfie & Photo Session (DIY)
activity_options.description: Bring your phones and capture memories! Find scenic beach spots, take fun selfies with ocean backdrop, candid friend shots, and Instagram-worthy moments
activity_options.tips: Best lighting during golden hour (late afternoon). Use burst mode for action shots. Try different poses and locations along the 1.5-mile beach!

activity_options.name: Private Beach Cabanas
activity_options.description: Reserve private poolside or beachside cabanas for ultimate luxury
activity_options.tips: Book early - these go fast! Includes shade, seating, and service

activity_options.name: Historic Carriage Tour
activity_options.description: Romantic horse-drawn carriage ride through Victorian historic district
activity_options.tips: Perfect for special occasions, sunset tours available

activity_options.name: 1.5 Miles Private Beach Access
activity_options.description: Exclusive access to pristine private beaches with summer service
activity_options.tips: Beach chairs and umbrellas provided in summer season

activity_options.name: Photography Concierge - Golden Hour Session
activity_options.description: 🎂 BOOKED FOR 5:00-6:00 PM! FREE professional photography service for BOTH Michael & John during golden hour. 60-minute session with MOSTLY individual shots for dating profiles + some friend photos together for birthday memories. Photographer will capture sunset at 5:33 PM with beach + resort backdrop. You'll both be glowing from spa treatments and dressed for birthday dinner!
activity_options.tips: ⭐ GOLDEN HOUR TIMING: 5:00 PM captures peak golden hour (4:33-5:53 PM) + sunset at 5:33 PM + blue hour. Skin at PEAK GLOW (4.2 hours after facial!). FOCUS: Individual headshots & full-body shots for dating profiles (each person), plus some casual friend shots together. Beach + resort combo. Expected: 30-50 professional edited photos. Perfect for dating apps! 📸
activity_options.special_notes: 40th birthday - 2 friends/besties - MOSTLY individual shots for dating profiles + some together shots - golden hour + sunset

activity_options.name: Ocean Overlook Chiminea (Beach Fire)
activity_options.description: Private chiminea overlooking dunes to Atlantic with s'mores experience fireside! Up to 4 guests
activity_options.tips: Check in at Lobby Lounge at reserved time. Book through ipoolside.com. Perfect for birthday celebration!

activity_options.name: Hot Tub Relaxation
activity_options.description: Unwind in resort hot tubs with ocean views
activity_options.tips: Perfect after activities or before dinner. Very relaxing!

activity_options.name: In-Room Celebration Package (Birthday)
activity_options.description: PERFECT FOR JOHN'S BIRTHDAY! Includes: Balloon bouquet, banner, personalized card, choice of charcuterie/cake, choice of champagne/bubbles
activity_options.tips: Must order 2 days in advance! Upgrade to Veuve Clicquot $75 or Moet $70. Choose balloon colors (up to 3): gold, silver, black, pink, etc.

activity_options.name: Morning Beach Walk & Seashell Hunt
activity_options.description: Early morning stroll along 1.5 miles of private beach. Perfect tide pools and shelling opportunities. Peaceful start to the day!
activity_options.tips: Morning is best for shell finding! Ocean is calm, beaches less crowded. Great for photos with morning light

activity_options.name: Plantation Artists' Guild & Gallery
activity_options.description: Local artists featuring paintings, pottery, jewelry, and crafts
activity_options.tips: Unique gifts and original art from local creators

activity_options.name: Big Talbot Island Boardwalk & Spoonbill Pond
activity_options.description: Boardwalk with bird watching platform at Spoonbill Pond for observing wading birds and migratory waterfowl
activity_options.tips: Bring binoculars, wheelchair accessible

activity_options.name: Hot Tub Relaxation
activity_options.description: Unwind in resort hot tubs with ocean views
activity_options.tips: Perfect after activities or before dinner. Very relaxing!

activity_options.name: Relaxed Beach Afternoon
activity_options.description: No agenda beach time! Bring a book, take selfies, walk the beach, collect shells, or just relax with ocean views. Your time, your pace
activity_options.tips: Grab beach chairs from resort. Perfect for just chilling without structured activities. Tide pools are amazing for exploring

activity_options.name: Fort Clinch State Park Trails
activity_options.description: 6-mile loop trail of moderate difficulty along marshes with beach access, gateway to Great Florida Birding Trail
activity_options.cost_range: FREE with park entry ($6-8 per vehicle)
activity_options.tips: Six miles of off-road wooded trails, bring water and sunscreen

activity_options.name: Willow Pond Trails at Fort Clinch
activity_options.description: Less than 1 mile trails through wildlife haven amid forested dunes
activity_options.tips: Shorter easy trail, great for families

activity_options.name: Blackrock Trail at Big Talbot
activity_options.description: Trail leading to famous driftwood beach with centuries-old trees creating breathtaking scene
activity_options.cost_range: FREE with park entry ($3-5 per vehicle)
activity_options.tips: Incredible photography opportunity, especially at golden hour

activity_options.name: Nightly Pirate Toast
activity_options.description: Fun pirate-themed toast ceremony in lobby
activity_options.tips: Kids love this! Check lobby for nightly time

activity_options.name: Two Resort Pools
activity_options.description: Multiple pools including one with kids splash pad
activity_options.tips: Kids splash pad is perfect for little ones!

activity_options.name: Hot Tub Relaxation
activity_options.description: Unwind in resort hot tubs with ocean views
activity_options.tips: Perfect after activities or before dinner. Very relaxing!

activity_options.name: Two Resort Pools
activity_options.description: Multiple pools including one with kids splash pad
activity_options.tips: Kids splash pad is perfect for little ones!

activity_options.name: Hot Tub Relaxation
activity_options.description: Unwind in resort hot tubs with ocean views
activity_options.tips: Perfect after activities or before dinner. Very relaxing!

activity_options.name: Parasailing
activity_options.description: Soar above the Atlantic with breathtaking aerial views of Amelia Island
activity_options.tips: Best on calm, clear days, no experience needed

activity_options.name: Sunrise Beach Walk & Shell Collecting
activity_options.description: Start your trip with a peaceful sunrise walk on the private beach. Best time for seashell hunting when tide is low!
activity_options.tips: Sunrise is around 6:45 AM in November. Perfect solo time before John arrives. Beach is yours!

activity_options.name: Morning Beach Selfies & Photos
activity_options.description: Get those dating profile shots in morning light! Beach is quiet, lighting is soft, and you have time to experiment with poses
activity_options.tips: Use timer mode or video screenshots. Morning light is flattering. Try beach, dunes, and resort backgrounds

activity_options.name: Resort Pool Relaxation
activity_options.description: Enjoy quiet pool time before crowds arrive. Perfect way to ease into vacation mode
activity_options.tips: Pools open early and are peaceful in the morning. Great for a quick dip or lounge time

activity_options.name: Final Beach Walk & Memory Photos
activity_options.description: Last chance for beach time! Walk the shore one more time, take final photos, collect a few more shells
activity_options.tips: Savor the last morning. Take photos to remember the trip. Maybe find that perfect shell!

activity_options.name: Pool & Hot Tub Farewell
activity_options.description: One last relaxing session at the resort pools before heading home
activity_options.tips: Peaceful way to end the trip. Reflect on all the memories made!

activity_options.name: Downtown Coffee & Last Minute Shopping
activity_options.description: Grab coffee in historic downtown and do any last-minute gift shopping or exploring
activity_options.tips: Perfect if you need to grab souvenirs or just want one last taste of Amelia Island charm

activity_options.name: Last Beach Day Before Departure
activity_options.description: Maximize your last hours! Beach chair, book, maybe a final swim. Whatever you want - it is YOUR time
activity_options.tips: Depending on flight time, you might have a few hours. Make the most of it!

activity_options.name: Explore Historic District
activity_options.description: Walk through Victorian-era downtown, browse shops, grab a coffee, soak in the charm
activity_options.tips: Centre Street is the main drag with shops, galleries, and cafes

activity_options.name: Relaxed Packing & Prep
activity_options.description: Take your time packing, relax in room, enjoy last moments before heading to airport
activity_options.tips: No stress! Build in buffer time for relaxed departure
